Top-3 Scripts: ul_673960: for f in /FILES/detail*; do awk -f test.awk $f > $(echo $f | sed -e 's/^\/FILES\///' -e 's/:/_/').csv; done

so_60557869: awk 'BEGIN{OFS=","} {$1=$1} 1' Input_file

awk '{print $1","$2}' Input_file
OR
awk 'BEGIN{OFS=","} {print $1,$2}' Input_file

au_497574: unoconv -f csv filename.xls

$ ls *.xls
ie_data.xls  QTL_Sample_data.xls  WBC_FTTC_Price_List_Entry_16-Aug-10.xls

$ unoconv -f csv *.xls 

$ ls *.csv
ie_data.csv  QTL_Sample_data.csv  WBC_FTTC_Price_List_Entry_16-Aug-10.csv
